bug.author: jwm111
bug.description:
it seems a bug in funciton "TransformationEstimationPointToPlane::ComputeRMSE". <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19990848/48341752-d6f3db80-e6a8-11e8-8cf4-e4defabb1bd6.png></denchmark-link>
I think the variable "err" is accumulative ï¼Œso "err = r * r" should be instead by "err += r * r".

comments.comment: That's great point. Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jwm111>@jwm111</denchmark-link> ! Could you submit PR for this?
